title: Anacostia Park: Playgrounds
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Playgrounds              Playgrounds         NPS  Climb, run, jump, and play on modern play equipment in Anacostia Park! Find playgrounds in several locations in the park:  Anacostia Ave. NE & E. Capitol St. 1500 Anacostia Ave. SE at the roller skating pavilion Nicholson St. & Anacostia Ave. SE 1700 Anacostia Ave. SE at the swimming pool and tennis courts
